title: Masoor Dal Soup powder for Babies, Instant Dal Soup for Babies
content:
Healthy and protein-rich masoor dal soup powder for babies. This is the best way to feed dal to your baby in an instant and takes less than 5 mins to make.
Mahima loves dal soup. But it really pains to cook it in a pressure cooker then puree it. So many pots and pans to wash. So I made th
